items.title: The New York Times Names The 10 Best Books of the Year
items.description: Welcome to Today in Books, our daily round-up of literary headlines at the intersection of politics, culture, media, and more.

items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for December 2, 2025
items.description: Forbidden magic in romantasy, a Hunger Games prequel, what it means to be a woman and a mother, and more in today's best book deals

items.title: The New York Times Announces Their 10 Best Books of 2025
items.description: Last week, The New York Times shared their 100 Notable Books of 2025. Now, they're back with their overall top 10 books of 2025.

items.title: 8 of the Best New Queer Books Out in December 2025
items.description: Queer books in translation, danmei fantasy novels, sapphic romance at a baking competition, and more new queer books out in December 2025!

items.title: NPR’s Picks for the Best Book Club Books of 2025
items.description: NPR says these eight books are some of the best book club books of 2025—and they're also included in Book Riot's Best Books of 2025 list!
